DOC.brief_summary: To assess safety escalate dose level MEDI-507 pediatric stem cell bone marrow allograft recipient least Grade II GvHD .
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase I , open-label dose escalation trial MEDI-507 pediatric SCT BMT recipient least Grade II acute GvHD . All patient receive steroid therapy MEDI-507 treatment GvHD
